description: This course will teach you how to be a great leader and manager in the workplace. The classes will cover the Abilities, the Mindset, and the Role that each great leader and manager has. there are documents found in this course that you can use in your interactions with co-workers that I myself use when working with the people around me. This is directed at any and all people that are looking to enter into or continue their education in Leadership and Management.
title: Leadership and Management Training
